statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, review_date FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY review_date DESC, customer_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, rating, review_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY review_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' OR feedback_text LIKE '%complaint%' ORDER BY rating ASC, review_date DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating < 4 ORDER BY reviewed_at ASC;
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM reviews WHERE customer_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM reviews GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;
SELECT review_text, reviewed_at FROM reviews WHERE rating <= 3 ORDER BY review_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT customer_id, review_text, rating, created_at FROM feedback JOIN reviews ON feedback.customer_id = reviews.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customers_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_strategies WHERE implementation_status = TRUE;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM content_strategies WHERE strategy_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customers_feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text, rating FROM reviews ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, implementation_status FROM content_strategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%' ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM content_strategies WHERE implementation_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM CustomerReviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, improvement_text FROM ContentImprovement WHERE improvement_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT feedback_id, jsonb_extract_path_text(analytics_data, 'rating') AS rating FROM FeedbackAnalytics;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT CustomerFeedback.feedback_id, CustomerFeedback.customer_id, CustomerReviews.review_text FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN CustomerReviews ON CustomerFeedback.customer_id = CustomerReviews.customer_id;
SELECT feedback_id, improvement_text FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN ContentImprovement ON CustomerFeedback.feedback_id = ContentImprovement.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM content_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM reviews WHERE feedback_id = 4 AND review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM content_strategies LEFT JOIN strategy_feedback ON content_strategies.strategy_id = strategy_feedback.strategy_id WHERE strategy_id = 5;
